text: Brock Pierce (born November 14, 1980) is an American businessman and former child actor. He is known for his work in the cryptocurrency industry. As a child actor, he was in Disney movies The Mighty Ducks (1992), D2: The Mighty Ducks (1994), and First Kid (1996). In 2000, he was accused of sexual abuse by three women. In July 2020, Pierce announced his candidacy for President of the United States as an Independent candidate for the 2020 election. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:2020 United States presidential candidates
title: Brock Pierce
